title: Advanced techniques for Web functional testing
summary: This talk will present multiple advanced techniques for Web functional testing. You will learn how to test a wide range of Web front-end components, such as CSS, visuals, responsive designs and user interactions — all using Python. Various practical tips will also be presented to harness your functional tests in real project workflows.
